attributes.action: Sack Alistair Darling and stop trying to blame bankers for your failing. Also stop being such communists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government are thiefs. Stop trying to rob bankers of their hard earned money just so you can have someone to blame. I really hope they all start tax evading and leave the country. You've already turned England into a crap hole you morons.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
